sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israel was keen to show its ground forces in Gaza on Saturday after a series of nighttime hit-and-run raids by its tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It says tanks and armored cars are now in the strip, but has stopped short of saying this is the full invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Overnight strikes knocked out telecommunications across Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israel's air force has been targeting Hamas tunnels and bunkers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It claims to have killed Atsam Abu Rafa, described by Israel as head of the Hamas Air Force.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They say he'd been directing drones and paragliders against Israeli forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israel says 1,400 people were killed in the Hamas attack on Oct. 7.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Gaza, the Hamas-run health ministry says the death toll among Palestinians has surpassed 7,700, claiming 60 percent are women and children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After three weeks of Israeli military bombardment, the streets of Gaza City are littered with rubble and garbage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: People line up for hours to buy shrinking supplies of bread and fresh water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israel is stepping up its offensive against Hamas despite international calls for an immediate ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In northern Gaza, the military bombed hundreds of residential buildings and a mosque near al-Shadi refugee camp early Friday. Top EU official Joseph Borrell posted on social media that Gaza was in a complete blackout and isolation. Last night's bombardment of Gaza by Israeli forces and ground operations were reportedly the most intensive yet, taking this terrible crisis to a new level of violence and pain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Palestinians displaced by the Israel-Hamas conflict have stormed a UN food supply centre in the southern Gaza Strip. The UN has repeatedly warned of a looming humanitarian disaster in the besieged territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A sea of people flood the streets of central London, waving Palestinian flags and calling for an end to the conflict in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Palestinian Health Ministry says more than 7,700 civilians have been killed in the three weeks since Hamas attacked Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Paris, protesters defied a government ban on pro-Palestinian demonstrations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: French authorities have cited security concerns. Activists say the ban violates the right to freedom of expression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators have also taken to the streets of Rome in a show of support for Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They called for peace and denounced Israel's bombardment of the Gaza Strip. The UN is calling for a humanitarian truce. This migrant boat is thought to have been carrying 60 people before it overturned

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: off the Sicilian coast. The Italian Coast Guard says the bodies of five people washed ashore in the town of Maranella. Local authorities detained 35 who survived.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They reportedly told police the boat left Tunisia on Thursday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Search and rescue teams are continuing to look for those still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The UN says more than 209,000 refugees and migrants have travelled by boat to European countries this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: More than 2,500 have died or are missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On Friday, the CI crew rescued 49 migrants from a boat in the central Mediterranean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The organisation says a critically ill pregnant woman has been taken to the Italian island of Lampedusa for treatment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The crew recovered the bodies of four people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Canadian-American actor and star of Friends, Matthew Perry, has died.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He was 54.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Perry was reportedly found dead at his Los Angeles home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The police say they're not treating his death as suspicious.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: NBC, which aired all ten seasons of Friends, said in a statement, he brought so much joy to hundreds of millions of people around the world with his pitch perfect comedic timing and dry wit. His legacy will live on through countless generations.
